RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 1 1M Turf CR: 83. Claiming Purse 11000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500. (Rail at 20 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BELLO CREEDO cleared from off the inside midway on the first turn, rated in showing the way up the backstretch and into the far turn, shrugged off a brief bid from the runner up turning for home, stayed clear to the wire under steady handling. CINCO RICHIE settled off the pace and the inside, moved closer to the winner late in the final turn, could do little more with that one through the lane, well clear of the others. ALLIGATOR CRAWL last to leave, began moved up to mid pack before a half, split foes into the lane, edged clear of the others while not a threat to the top two. MIDNIGHT OIL fell back to trail after the start,moved out and lodged a four wide middle move into contention through the final turn, flattened out through the stretch. PUTTHEHAMMERDOWN broke back, lacked speed, improved position in the three path without posing a serious threat. BUCK'S GLORY raced n the main body, two path into the lane, also lacked a serious closing kick. COTTONCLUB SOLDIER vied early inside the winner, fell back when a bit keen first turn, chased that same rival for the next four furlongs, had little left for the drive,. PRINCE OF GLORY in the second flight early, was finished after a half. CHIEF KIMOSABI in mid pack early, also fell back after a four furlongs and was done. C. F. CONGRESS fell back to trail after a quarter, saved some ground into the far turn, steered out to be five wide into the stretch, failed to rally.

ENTRY.NAME: Midnight Oil
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back to trail, middle move 4w 2nd turn, flattened

ENTRY.NAME: Buck's Glory
ENTRY.COMMENT: main body, lacked closing kick 2p

ENTRY.NAME: Putthehammerdown
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, lacked speed, improved 3w, no real threat

ENTRY.NAME: C. F. Congress
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back to trail, steered 5w into lane, no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Cottonclub Soldier
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied early, moved out, chased, little left

ENTRY.NAME: Chief Kimosabi
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, fell back after half

ENTRY.NAME: Prince of Glory
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight, finished after half

ENTRY.NAME: Alligator Crawl
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, back, advanced, split foes into lane, no match top 2

ENTRY.NAME: Cinco Richie
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled off pace, closer, brief bid 1/4, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Bello Creedo
ENTRY.COMMENT: cleared 1st turn, rated, shrugged off foe, stayed clear

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 2 1M Dirt CR: 66. Maiden Claiming Purse 10000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LOST GOLD back off the pace when five wide into the first turn, stalked the soft splits in the run up the backstretch, advanced and took over from the outside turning for home, drew out under token encouragement to win ridden out. SHOETRICK lacked speed in trailing early, raced with the winner inside that one into the far turn, tipped out a bit after falling off that rival three furlongs out, rallied four into the lane, proved no match for that same rival, clearly second best. KAT'S SOLDIER settled in mid pack, asked along three wide in some traffic second turn, lost contact with the top two in upper stretch, along late for the show. COLE'S SENSATION pulled early when prompting the issue through the first turn, put a head in front before a half, showed the way into the far turn, began to weaken when headed by that rival soon after. POWER MASTER four wide when off the pace in the first turn, lacked a closing response. BOSS MAN ZONG pulled hard while between horses forcing the issue early, continued to race forwardly up the backstretch, gave way readily in the far turn. VERDUNVILLE set a soft early pace under restraint and gave ay after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Kat's Soldier
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, asked along three wide 2nd turn, along for show

ENTRY.NAME: Verdunville
ENTRY.COMMENT: soft early pace, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Boss Man Zong
ENTRY.COMMENT: pulled btwn foes early, nothing left in giving way far turn

ENTRY.NAME: Shoetrick
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed, moved out, 4w rally, no match, clear 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Cole's Sensation
ENTRY.COMMENT: pulled early, took over, weakened when headed

ENTRY.NAME: Power Master
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4w first turn, lacked closing response

ENTRY.NAME: Lost Gold
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off pace, 5w 1st turn, stalked in hand, took over,ridden out

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 3 5F Turf CR: 69. Maiden Special Weight Purse 30000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. (Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less $20,000). (Rail at 20 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DONEGAL MISCHIEF balked a bit at loading, broke with the field, forwardly placed early inside, asked a bit to maintain continued position along the rail into the turn, accelerated sharply when called on for run into the lane and quickly put the field away under firm handling in a promising debut. SUNNY SASSICAIA back off the early pace, moved out, came four wide and between horses out of the turn, rallied to be clear for the place while no threat to the winner. JOSIE'S PRIORITY within striking distance behind the first flight, moved out a bit to be four then five wide turning for home to lose some ground, mild rally late to be up for the show. KNOT THE ONE vied early while outside, dueled with the winner through much of the turn, could not match that one into the lane and continued to weaken to lose the show. PRINCE COSMO raced back off the pace and the inside, four wide through the turn, lacked a serious bid while picking off a couple of tiring rivals. FLASHY LOVER last to leave, trailed early, failed to menace while racing in a bit of traffic through the lane. INGLIS forwardly placed for three furlongs, backed up through the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Donegal Mischief
ENTRY.COMMENT: forward inside, held position rail, quickly clear, sharp

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Gage Hill Stables, LLC & W. S. Farish

ENTRY.NAME: Sunny Sassicaia
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off the pace,4w and btwn foes into lane,rallied 2nd,no match

ENTRY.NAME: Flashy Lover
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, failed to menace while in some traffic stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Josie's Priority
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance, behind 1st flight,4-5w into lane,up 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Inglis
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed for three furlongs, backed up stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Prince Cosmo
ENTRY.COMMENT: off the pace four wide, lacked serious bid

ENTRY.NAME: Knot the One
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied early outside, dueled turn, weakened

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 76. Claiming Purse 11000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TALK TO TOKEY took control into the first turn, clear onto the backstretch, rated kindly the middle half, drew off steadily through the lane to win ridden out. TIME TO MOVE settled off the pace and the inside, three wide through the final turn and into the stretch, proved no match for the winner in chasing that one past the furlong marker, fully extended to hold the runner up spot late. FORGED IN STEEL lacked any speed inside, continued to save ground second turn, roused for the drive, lodged a mild rally up the rail to be slowly getting to the runner up late. BONUS APPRECIATION in a bit tight at the break to be last away, trailed for a half, four wide into the lane, displayed some mild late interest to improve position. GOLDEN QUALITY chased the winner for six furlongs and weakened entering the stretch. QUARTER RAT back off the pace and the inside, four wide exiting the final turn, failed to muster a rally. MICHAEL'S BAD BOY forwardly placed for a half, retreated.

ENTRY.NAME: Forged in Steel
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed inside, roused rail into lane, slow gain 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Time to Move
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled off pace and inside, 3w into lane, no match,all out 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Talk to Tokey
ENTRY.COMMENT: took control early, rated kindly, drew off stretch, ridden out

ENTRY.NAME: Bonus Appreciation
ENTRY.COMMENT: bit tight, last away, trailed, 4w into lane, mild late interest

ENTRY.NAME: Quarter Rat
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off pace, 4w into lane, no really

ENTRY.NAME: Golden Quality
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Michael's Bad Boy
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed for a half, retreated

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 59. Claiming Purse 13000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: STOP SHOP N DROP lacked early foot off the inside, steady advance while four wide through the turn, five wide into the lane, kept coming past the furlong marker, challenged late, edged in the final strides under firm handling. JUST A WIN hopped at the start to race well off the early pace, fanned six wide exiting the turn when commencing to rally, closed with continued resolve to be up for the place. CRYPTO BRAVE in the first flight well off the inside, fell back off the leader in the turn, chased then got back to that one as the top two were joining the fray with less than a furlong remaining, outkicked for the second spot late. GOTTEMINABIND behind the pace while racing just off the inside, went evenly through the lane in lacking a closing response. TALENTS HOT DEAL broke alertly, cleared to the inside, showed the way up the backstretch, shook clear into the turn, continued to hold a daylight advantage past midstretch then faltered. ROSIE SPRIT lacked early foot, dropped inside in the turn, improved slightly through the lane without posing a serious threat. MISS E. FU in the middle of the pace while well off the inside, four wide through the turn, lacked a serious kick as well through the lane. ALL AMERICAN PAT moved up to pressure the leader in the two path in the run up the backstretch, began to weaken through the turn. SABERFIGHT forwardly placed four wide backstretch, began a steady fade after four furlongs. THIRSTYPROSPECT off a step slow, remained back. T J'S SUNSHINE was finished early, far back.

ENTRY.NAME: Thirstyprospect
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow, remained back

ENTRY.NAME: Gotteminabind
ENTRY.COMMENT: behind the pace just off the inside, evenly drive

ENTRY.NAME: All American Pat
ENTRY.COMMENT: moved up to press the issue backstretch 2p, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: T J's Sunshine
ENTRY.COMMENT: finished early, far back

ENTRY.NAME: Stop Shop N Drop
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked early foot, 4-5w advance turn, kept coming, edged clear

ENTRY.NAME: Talents Hot Deal
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke alertly, early pace, cleared turn, faltered final furlong

ENTRY.NAME: Just a Win
ENTRY.COMMENT: hopped start, raced back, fanned 6w into lane, willingly

ENTRY.NAME: Rosie Sprit
ENTRY.OWNER: Hernandez Earl J Hernandez Keith J and Duvieilh John
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed, dropped inside turn, improved slight

ENTRY.NAME: Miss E. Fu
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle of the pack, 4w out of turn, lacked serious kick

ENTRY.NAME: Crypto Brave
ENTRY.COMMENT: first flight 3w, chased, outkicked late for 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Saberfight
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed early four wide, faded

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 6 5F Turf CR: 56. Maiden Special Weight Purse 30000. FOR MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 118 lbs. (Rail at 20 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GONE ELVIS with the pace from the start while between horses up the backstretch, shook clear in the turn, held a comfortable advantage to the wire under a steady hand ride to win ridden out. BOBBY BOY broke in, raced in the second flight inside, saved ground through the turn, continued along the inside through the stretch, proved game for the place while not a threat to the winner. MAX IS G MONEY within striking distance early outside, four wide into the stretch, rallied to race closest to the winner past the furlong marker, had little for that one to the wire, outfinished for the runner up spot. RITE ON SAM back off the pace outside, four wide through the turn, five wide into the lane, advanced a bit upper then flattened out in the final furlong. DYNAMIC SUN off slowly, remained back for three furlongs, came three wide for the drive, improved slightly without posing a serious threat. STRONG DIAMOND vied up front early, dueled up front inside the winner for a quarter, first to blink in the turn. DA RINGO fell back to trail after the start, came five wide into the lane, made little impact through the lane. JUST ASK WATTS vied up front while between horses, began to retreat by late in the turn. YAKETY YAK off slow and remained always back.

ENTRY.NAME: Dynamic Sun
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slowly, raced back, 3w into lane, improved slightly

ENTRY.NAME: Bobby Boy
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in, 2nd flight inside, stayed on rail, game 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Strong Diamond
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied up front early, dueled turn inside, 1st to blink

ENTRY.NAME: Yakety Yak
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow, remained back

ENTRY.NAME: Just Ask Watts
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied early btwn foes, retreated

ENTRY.NAME: Gone Elvis
ENTRY.COMMENT: with pace from start btwn, shook clear turn, held stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Rite On Sam
ENTRY.OWNER: Angelle Glenn M and Tamporello Glenn A
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off pace, 4-5w turn, flattened out bit late

ENTRY.NAME: Da Ringo
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back to trail, 5w into lane, no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Max Is G Money
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance outside, 4w into lane, outkicked 2nd

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 7 7F Dirt CR: 68. Claiming Purse 13000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GRAHAM 'S CRUISER bumped early leaving the gate, raced back onto the main track, advanced from between horses turn, three wide into the lane, engaged the leaders past the furlong marker and edged clear under firm handling. MR ELVIN lacked speed inside, continued to save ground through the turn while being asked for run, rallied up the rail to be clear for the place. JOEY'S LIGHTENING broke back, lacked speed near the back, advanced four wide through the turn, continued to display moderate energy to be well clear of the others, not enough for the top two late. MIZSPELT dueled up front in the two path, continued to battle up front into the lane, weakened from between horses the final furlong. NOCOMET bumped with the winner just after the start, moved up to race in midpack, behind the leaders into the stretch, lugged out with a furlong to run and finished up evenly. JANET'S DEVIL alternated up front closest to the inside for five furlongs, surrendered the advantage when straightened for home then continued to gradually weaken to the wire. BAQUERO'S BIND went one paced while racing three wide, failed to menace. YOUR TIME'S COMING off a bit slow, remained back throughout. GENERAL EISENHOWER tired while racing off the inside. THE THREE KS forwardly placed early while three wide, stopped. FINAL CLOCKING WAS HAND TIMED DUE TO TIMER MALFUNCTION.

ENTRY.NAME: Mr Elvin
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed, rail trip, up for place

ENTRY.NAME: Janet's Devil
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled up front for five furlongs inside, gave way final furlong

ENTRY.NAME: Nocomet
ENTRY.COMMENT: early bump, moved up to mid pack, roused, lugged 1/8, even

ENTRY.NAME: Graham 's Cruiser
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped early,closer turn btwn, 3w rally, outside bid,edged clear

ENTRY.NAME: Your Time's Coming
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow, back

ENTRY.NAME: Mizspelt
ENTRY.OWNER: BMS Racing Stable (Sarah Delany) and Hanna James E
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled up front 2p, weakened final furlong

ENTRY.NAME: The Three Ks
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed early 3w, stopped

ENTRY.NAME: General Eisenhower
ENTRY.COMMENT: tired while off the inside

ENTRY.NAME: Baquero's Bind
ENTRY.COMMENT: one paced three wide, failed to menace

ENTRY.NAME: Joey's Lightening
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, lacked speed, 4w advance turn, clear of others

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 8 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 93. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 36000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR CLAIMING PRICE $20,000. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 28, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. A Race Since May 28, 2023 Allowed 5 lbs. Claiming Price $20,000 (Claiming Races For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ALTERANA broke on top, never far back while racing outside, crept closer in the three path late in the turn, long drive, narrowly showed the way past the furlong marker then drew clear late. BINDING AGREEMENT lacked speed, moved outside, four wide turning into the stretch, staged a late rally to be in time for the runner up spot. PRADO'S PRIORITY away well, narrowly showed the way along the inside, continued to vie through upper stretch to the inside of the winner, proved stubborn until late when nipped for the place. EASY RUNNER off a step slow, raced back as a result, was five wide exiting the turn, displayed some mild late interest down the middle of the strip. ANDIAMO GIACOMO completely devoid of speed for three furlongs, showed some belated interest to improve his position. HOLY BAYOU dueled up front off the inside for three furlongs and gave way. SCARLETTSBLACKJACK failed to respond in lacking a closing response. GOLD PUNCH popped stall doors, raced in the second flight early, beat a steady retreat.

ENTRY.NAME: Easy Runner
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow, back, 5w into lane, improved position

ENTRY.NAME: Gold Punch
ENTRY.COMMENT: popped stall doors, 2nd flight early, beat a steady retreat

ENTRY.NAME: Scarlettsblackjack
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace in lacking a response

ENTRY.NAME: Prado's Priority
ENTRY.COMMENT: away well, narrowly showed the way inside, stubborn til late

ENTRY.NAME: Binding Agreement
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed, 4w into lane, late rally 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Andiamo Giacomo
ENTRY.COMMENT: devoid of speed, belated interest

ENTRY.NAME: Holy Bayou
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled for three furlongs 2p, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Alterana
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back outside, closer 3w into lane, long drive, clear

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 9 5F Dirt CR: 57. Maiden Claiming Purse 12000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: STRAY CAT STRUT broke back, asked early, raced three wide through the turn, kicked down the leader inside the furlong marker and kicked well clear to win going away. FLASH OF RAIN broke well, pressed the issue early off the inside, dueled turn, shook off the other speed to be clear in upper stretch, offered but brief resistance to the winner then proved no match, held sway for the place. MINE YOUR BIZ in mid pack for a quarter inside, steered out five wide for room entering the stretch, finished willingly to be getting to the runner up late. TRUVY'S BANDIT void of speed along the inside, continued to save ground through the turn, rallied down the stretch to also to finish well. CHELSEA'S GLORY last away, raced back off the pace out in the strip, four wide turning for home, went evenly to the wire. ADDISONS WARRIOR broke on top, showed the way up the backstretch, dueled through the turn closest to the inside, faltered entering the stretch. MEAN MEISTER forwardly placed for three furlongs, had little left for the stretch run. RUNAWAY JIM broke back, lacked speed, six wide into the stretch, failed to muster a rally. OAK HILL MO remained always back to also lack a rally. SMOOTH CUSTOM in the second flight early, backed up.

ENTRY.NAME: Truvy's Bandit
ENTRY.COMMENT: void of speed inside, saved ground turn, rallied

ENTRY.NAME: Addisons Warrior
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke on top, early pace inside, dueled turn, faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Mine Your Biz
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack inside, steered out 5w into lane, willingly

ENTRY.NAME: Smooth Custom
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight early, backed up

ENTRY.NAME: Flash of Rain
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke well, pressed early, dueled turn, clear, no match late

ENTRY.NAME: Runaway Jim
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, 6w into lane, no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Stray Cat Strut
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk back, asked early, 3w turn, kicked down leader, going away

ENTRY.NAME: Mean Meister
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed for three furlongs, little for drive

ENTRY.NAME: Chelsea's Glory
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, four wide into the lane, evenly to the wire

ENTRY.NAME: Oak Hill Mo
ENTRY.COMMENT: remained always back
